comments.body: I too have been noticing the QuoteBitcointalk.org image proxy invalid image error on several posts of recent, but i on my own have not encountered such error on any image i post, ive never used imgbb, what i use all the time is imgur.Though i also discovered that image link can be copied wrongly, and when its copied wrongly, the image proxy error is displayed in place of the image ..For Example -Below is one/same image from imgur with two different links, first link is copied wrongly while the second link is copied correctly.image link was copied the wrong way/wrong formatQuotehttps://imgur.com/Qhlg7zbimage link is copied the right way/right format Quotehttps://talkimg.com/images/2023/12/16/E4E1c.jpegI guess this is the mistake some of this forum users always make while coping image link which then result to image proxy error that we see on several posts.So this is my personal note to everyone who might not know, when next you are trying to post an image on the forum through a link, make sure the image format is at the end of the link, else, the image wont display, image format can be .png or .jpg, and always remember to resize your image if its to large.
